branchCategory.name: PSE570, Remote Analog Pressure Sensor, Enhanced, IP65
branchCategory.description: <p>PSE570 remote pressure sensors offer positive pressure ranges from 500 kPa to 10 MPa, with increased proof pressures and a higher withstand voltage for improved durability in unpredictable conditions.  A nickel-plated C3604 brass port and ceramic sensor impart compatibility with a wide range of liquids and gases.  An analog V or mA signal ouput is transmitted over a cable with an M12 connector.  Accuracy is <span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">±1% full scale for pressure below 1 MPa and </span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">±2.5% for higher ranges. PSE570 sensors are CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP65 enclosure rating.</span></p>

breadCrumb.name: PSE570, Remote Analog Pressure Sensor, Enhanced, IP65
